articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Art Performance
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Art Performance
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed together with servicepersons of the KPA  a performance given by the art squad of KPA Unit 10215.
					 Put on the stage were such colorful numbers of diverse genres as female chorus "Fortune of Korea", male solo and pangchang "We Are Yearning for Your Sunny Smile", female solo "I Sing of Party", two persons' poem recital and bass guitar solo "Push Back the Frontiers of the Latest Science and Technology" and poetic story-telling "Let Us Become Satellite of the Sun Generation after Generation".  
					
					 The performers successfully represented the invincible might of the KPA which has grown to be a powerful revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu under the loving care of the great brilliant commander of Songun and the firm faith and will of the servicepersons to devotedly defend the headquarters of the revolution and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche with arms, always remaining true to the Party.
					
					 Warmly waving back to the enthusiastically cheering performers and audience, he congratulated them on the successful performance.
					
					 He extended high appreciation and thanks to the members of the art squad, expressing great satisfaction over the fact that they staged a splendid performance rich in ideological contents and high in artistry with numbers of great cognitional and educational value as they truthfully represented the inexhaustible mental power and noble moral traits of the revolutionary army of the DPRK dynamically advancing full of optimism and joy with transparent outlook on the leader and the revolution. 
					
					 He set forth important tasks which would serve as guidelines for intensifying the revolutionary and militant performing activities.
					
					 Among the audience were Kim Ki Nam and Hong Sok Hyong, members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the Central Committee of the WPK, Kim Kyong Hui, member of the Political Bureau and department director of the C.C., the WPK, Jang Song Thaek, alternate member of the Political Bureau and department director of the C.C., the WPK, and other leading officials of the C.C., the WPK, U Tong Chuk, alternate member of the Political Bureau and member of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, Kim Chang Sop, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK, KPA General Yun Jong Rin, member of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, and other commanding officers of the army and armed forces organs.

articles.title: Hu Jintao Meets WPK Delegation
articles.content:
Hu Jintao Meets WPK Delegation
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Hu Jintao, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and president of the People's Republic of China, met the visiting delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Choe Thae Bok, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, at the Great Hall of the People Saturday.
					 Hu said that the Conference of the WPK that was successfully held in the run-up to the 65th birthday of the WPK reelected Kim Jong Il as general secretary of the WPK.
					
					 Hu noted that he extends once again warm congratulations to Kim Jong Il, the WPK Central Committee and all the Korean people from the bottom of his heart on behalf of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.
					
					 He stressed that he is convinced that the Korean people would achieve greater successes in building a thriving socialist nation under the leadership of the WPK headed by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He expressed belief that the traditional Sino-DPRK friendship provided and cultivated by Chairman Mao Zedong and President Kim Il Sung would steadily grow stronger and be conveyed down to posterity.
					
					 Noting that Kim Jong Il visited China twice this year, he continued:
					
					 I had a frank and in-depth exchange of views on the bilateral relations and important international and regional matters and reached a consensus on wide-ranging issues.
					
					 It is the steadfast policy of the CPC to attach utmost importance to the development of relations with the DPRK and boost the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries.
					
					 We will make positive efforts together with the central leadership organ of the WPK headed by General Secretary Kim Jong Il to develop the bilateral friendly and cooperative relations and defend the regional peace and security in the spirit of "inheriting tradition, facing up to the future, building good neighborly friendship and strengthening cooperation."
					
					 The talks proceeded in a comradely and friendly atmosphere.
					
					 Present there were Wang Jiarui, head of the International Liaison Department of the CPC Central Committee, Chen Shiju, director of General Secretary Hu Jintao's Office, Liu Jieyi, deputy head of the International Liaison Department of the CPC Central Committee, and Choe Pyong Gwan, DPRK ambassador to China.

articles.title: WPK Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
WPK Delegation Back Home
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea led by Choe Thae Bok, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, returned home Saturday after visiting China.
					 It left Beijing on the same day.
					
					 While staying in China the delegation enjoyed an art performance at the State Grand Theatre of China and was invited to the reception given by Liu Yunshan, member of the Political Bureau, member of the Secretariat and head of Publicity Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

articles.title: Commemorative Coins to Be Minted
articles.content:
Commemorative Coins to Be Minted
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Commemorative coins will be minted in the DPRK on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly promulgated a decree in this regard on October 1. 
					
					 The commemorative coins "65th Anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea" will be minted in gold and silver. 
					
					 Seen in the centre of the front sides of the gold and silver coins is the party logo depicted in bold relief against the background of Mt. Paektu, a holy mountain of revolution, the flag of the "Down-With Imperialism Union" and sun rays. Inscribed in their lower parts are letters "65th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea," "1945" and "2010." Each coin is framed with 65 leaves of laurel trees.
					
					 Depicted in relief in the centre of their reverses is the Emblem of the DPRK. Given on either side are an explanation about the degree of purity and weight and seen in the upper parts of the coins are words "the Central Bank of the DPRK" and in their lower parts the year of their minting. 
					
					 The size of the pure gold commemorative coin is 35 mm in diameter and 2 mm in thickness and that of pure silver commemorative coin is 40 mm in diameter and 3 mm in thickness.

articles.title: Workers Rallies Held on Kim Jong Il's Reelection
articles.content:
Workers Rallies Held on Kim Jong Il's Reelection
Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Rallies of agricultural workers and officials and members of the women's union were held in Chongsan-ri, Kangso District of Nampho City and at the plaza of the Arch of Triumph in Pyongyang Saturday to congratulate General Secretary Kim Jong Il on his reelection as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea
					 Present there were Secretary of the WPK Central Committee Choe Ryong Hae and other officials concerned. 
					
					 Reports and speeches were made there. 
					
					 The reporters and speakers noted that the reelection of Kim Jong Il to the top post of the WPK provided a sure guarantee for firmly defending and successfully accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche under the leadership of the WPK.
					
					 They noted that several decades during which Kim Jong Il has led the WPK and the revolution are a sacred period when he has strengthened the WPK into the party of President Kim Il Sung, ever-victorious revolutionary party of Juche type and performed undying exploits for the country and the people, the era and history with his outstanding idea and dynamic revolutionary practices. 
					
					 They stressed the need to fully display the spirit of defending the leader with their lives and remain true to the Songun cause of the Party, cherishing the firm faith that the prosperity of Juche Korea and the eternal happiness of its people are guaranteed thanks to the great and brilliant commander of Songun. 
					
					 Similar rallies were held in Kangwon and North Hamgyong Provinces. 
					
					 Speakers there said that the reelection of Kim Jong Il as general secretary of the WPK was a manifestation of the absolute support and boundless reverence of all the army and people of Korea for him who performed immortal exploits for the country and the nation, the era and history with his dynamic revolutionary practices.

articles.title: Participants of WPK Conference Visit Different Places
articles.content:
Participants of WPK Conference Visit Different Places
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The participants of the Conference of the Workers' Party of Korea visited the construction site of Huichon Power Station No. 2 Friday.
					 Watching a huge dam which has reached the phase of completion in a matter of a little over one year, they were deeply impressed by the heroic stamina being displayed by the soldier builders waging a dynamic offensive in a do-or-die spirit.
					
					 They also visited the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Silk Mill and looked round the confectionary production process at the Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory put on a CNC basis and an exhibition of products and other places.

articles.title: Notice Sent to Unification Ministry of S. Korea
articles.content:
Notice Sent to Unification Ministry of S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The General Guidance Bureau for the Development of Scenic Spots of the DPRK Saturday sent a notice to the Ministry of Unification of south Korea proposing the working talks between the authorities of the north and the south. 
					 Proposing to hold the working talks between the authorities in Kaesong on October 15 as regards the issue of the real estates of the south side in the Mt. Kumgang area and the issue of resuming tour according to the consultation made at the north-south Red Cross working contact made on Friday, the notice said that DPRK side would send three officials concerned including the director of the above-said bureau.

articles.title: DPRK Will to Develop Friendly Relations with UN Member
articles.content:
DPRK Will to Develop Friendly Relations with UN Member
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The DPRK government will boost the friendly and cooperative relations with all other member nations of the UN and fulfill all its responsibilities to preserve peace and security in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the world, declared Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK Pak Kil Yon, who headed the DPRK delegation, when addressing the plenary meeting of the 65th UN General Assembly on September 29.
					 The past 65 years covered by the UN is a history of ceaseless challenges to the objective and principles of the UN Charter, he said, and went on:
					
					 Such acts of violating international law and an international order have persisted owing to the high-handed and arbitrary actions of individual powers and the signboard of "defence of human rights" and the institutional lever called the UN General Assembly are abused for this purpose. The DPRK is one of these victims. 
					
					 Underscoring the need to strengthen the role of the UN through a more positive and correct reform of the UN and decisively increase the authority of the UN General Assembly, he went on:
					
					 The 30th UN General Assembly in 1975 adopted a resolution calling for dismantling the "UN Command" in south Korea and forcing foreign forces to withdraw from south Korea and replacing the Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty as a measure to defuse tension and preserve lasting peace on the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 35 years have passed since then, but the state of ceasefire, which is neither war nor peace, is going on in the peninsula.
					
					 As the resolution of the UN General Assembly is not implemented, the DPRK's efforts to protect sovereignty and achieve peaceful development are exposed to a constant threat and infringed upon and there periodically prevails on the peninsula an explosive situation that pushes it to the brink of war.
					
					 The DPRK proposed to the signatories to the Armistice Agreement an early start of the talks for replacing the AA with a peace treaty this year which marks the lapse of six decades since the outbreak of Korean war.
					
					 When the talks take place, the UN General Assembly will witness the historic resolution adopted 35 years ago enter into the phase of its implementation.
					
					 Noting that the DPRK remains unchanged in its stand of opposing a nuclear war, nuclear arms race and nuclear proliferation, the head of the delegation clarified that as a responsible nuclear weapons state the DPRK is willing to join all other nuclear weapons states in the efforts to realize international nuclear non-proliferation and safely manage nuclear substance on an equal footing.
					
					 He categorically refuted the provocative remarks made by a "delegate" of south Korea who raised again the "Cheonan" case while misinterpreting even the presidential statement of the UNSC dated July 9, 2010 and urged the south Korean authorities to immediately come out for north-south dialogue to solve pending issues mentioned in the presidential statement.

articles.title: National Photo Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
National Photo Exhibition Opens
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- A national photo exhibition opened with due ceremony at the People's Palace of Culture on Saturday to celebrate the 65th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 On display at the exhibition are more than 340 photos including those dealing with the immortal exploits President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il performed by founding the WPK and working heart and soul to develop it. 
					
					 Among them are the photo titled "The great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung forming the Down-with-Imperialism Union" and other photos on the noble traits of the President who advanced the policy of building an independent party in the early period of the Korean revolution and successfully accomplished the cause of founding a revolutionary party after the liberation.
					
					 Also displayed there are photos dealing with the leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il who has led the WPK and the revolution to one victory after another, ushering in a great heyday in the efforts to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Among them are photos showing the platform of the Conference of the WPK and a rally held by servicepersons of the three services of the Korean People's Army and the Pyongyang city rally congratulating Kim Jong Il on his reelection as general secretary of the WPK. They reflect the great excitement and pride of the army and people having Kim Jong Il at the top posts of the party and the revolution and their unshakable faith and will to build a thriving nation and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche true to the Songun leadership of the party.
					
					 Also on display there are photos dealing with the exploits the peerlessly great persons performed in the efforts to achieve national reunification and the human cause of independence.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony of the exhibition were Secretary of the WPK Central Committee Kim Ki Nam, vice-President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly Yang Hyong Sop, officials concerned and working people in the city.
					
					 Minister of Culture An Tong Chun made an opening speech.

articles.title: New Postage Stamp Issued
articles.content:
New Postage Stamp Issued
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has issued a new sheetlet to mark the opening of the Europhila 2010 International Youth Stamp Collector's Exhibition in Stockholm, Sweden.
					 Printed in the sheetlet are the emblem of the exhibition and pictures of dinosaurs -- brontosaurus, allosaurus and pterodactylus.

articles.title: "Selected Works of Kim Jong Il" Vol. 5 Published
articles.content:
"Selected Works of Kim Jong Il" Vol. 5 Published
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House brought out Vol. 5 of "Selected Works of Kim Jong Il" (enlarged edition) comprehensively dealing with his works.
					 The book contains 12 works including speeches, conclusions, talks, etc. made by Kim Jong Il from March to December, Juche 62 (1973).
					
					 His work "On the Art of the Cinema" specifies the principles and ways of producing and creating Juche-oriented and revolutionary cinematic art and literature and art.
					
					 In his works "Novel 'Mangyongdae' Is a Masterpiece Which Successfully Depicts the Childhood of the Great Leader" and "On Consolidating and Developing Achievements Made in the Creation of Revolutionary Operas" and other works he clarified the tasks and ways for effecting a turn in the creation of literary works and putting the opera art on a higher level by consolidating and developing the achievements made in the creation of revolutionary operas.
					
					 The book also contains works indicating the tasks and ways for improving the ideological work of the party.
					
					 Also contained in the book are works dealing with the specific tasks which would serve as guidelines for enforcing the universal eleven-year compulsory education and enhancing the responsibility and role of teachers and works indicating ways for developing sports science Korean way.
					
					 There are in the book works giving perfect solutions to theoretical and practical issues arising in the revolution and construction including the matter of firmly arming the party members and other working people with the revolutionary outlook on the world and arousing their voluntary enthusiasm.

articles.title: WPK Guided by President Kim Il Sung's Ideas
articles.content:
WPK Guided by President Kim Il Sung's Ideas
Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung", a famous work published by General Secretary Kim Jong Il on October 2, Juche 84 (1995), mirrors his unshakable will to steadily develop the WPK into an invincible revolutionary party carrying forward the ideas and cause of President Kim Il Sung. 
					The work gives a comprehensive explanation of the President's unique idea, theory, exploits and experience concerning the party building, elucidating the tasks and ways for developing the WPK into the party of Kim Il Sung.
					
					Over the past fifteen years since its publication, the WPK has grown to be a powerful revolutionary party guided by the President's revolutionary ideas in its building and activities. 
					
					All the party work has been done on the basis of the Juche idea, the Songun idea supported and implemented by all the people.
					
					The WPK, in perfect harmony with the popular masses, has accelerated the revolution and successfully guided the effort for the prosperity of the country while consolidating in every way its unity provided by the President.
					
					The WPK's thoughts and activities are all aimed at turning the country into a thriving one as early as possible to provide the people with a better life.
					
					The historic conference of the WPK held some days ago proclaimed that the President, who founded the party and led the Korean revolution triumphantly, always remains in the party's top leadership.
					
					Kim Jong Il, who has strengthened the WPK into the party of Kim Il Sung, a Juche-typed revolutionary party, was reelected as its general secretary at the conference.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Redress Its Past Crimes
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Redress Its Past Crimes
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Japan should make a bold decision to deeply repent and fairly settle the crimes it committed against the Koreans and other Asian people in the past at an early date, mindful that doing so will be beneficial for itself.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 It says:
					
					 Should the chief executive of Japan have a proper stand on the past history, he would have made this issue clear in detail and plainly expressed the stand on apology and reparation for the past crimes.
					
					 How Japan makes reparation for its past crimes will be an important criterion proving the sincerity of its apology.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are craftily working to cover up the truth about Japan's past crimes and bury them into oblivion in the history, far from clearly atoning for them and turning over a new leaf for peace and progress.
					
					 Such wrong stand of Japan toward its past crimes can hardly be regarded as a scheme to only evade reparation for them.
					
					 Its attempt to evade the responsibility for settling the past has come from its foolish intention to realize the old dream about "Greater east Asia co-prosperity sphere."
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are persistently evading the settlement of the past and getting hell-bent on the distortion of history in an aim to intensify the moves for reinvasion.
					
					 Liquidation of the past is the historical task and duty that Japan should carry out without fail at any time.
					
					 Japan's continued refusal to redress the past will only invite bitter denunciation and isolation from the international community.

articles.title: Abrogation of Criminal S. Korea-US "Treaty" Demanded
articles.content:
Abrogation of Criminal S. Korea-US "Treaty" Demanded
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday carries a signed article on the lapse of 57 years since the U.S. and the south Korean ruling quarters concluded the treacherous "mutual defense treaty" for aggression.
					 On Oct. 1, 1953, right after the ceasefire, the U.S. imperialists instigated the Syngman Rhee clique to sign the south Korea-U.S. "mutual defense treaty" in a sinister bid to realize their criminal scenario to put Korea under their control. Pursuant to this "treaty", the U.S. has kept its aggression forces in south Korea and established a military control over the puppet forces, turning south Korea into its military base and using the puppet forces as a shock brigade for carrying out its war of aggression.
					
					 The "treaty" is a shackling and unequal military pact for aggression as it legalized the U.S. imperialist aggression forces' permanent presence in south Korea and their moves for the provocation of a war against the DPRK and, on this basis, hamstrung the efforts for inter-Korean reconciliation, unity and reunification and brought only submission, disgrace, misfortune and disaster to the south Koreans, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. stipulated in the "treaty" the "right to deploy the three services of its forces in south Korea and its vicinity" and "its indefinite validity", legalizing the U.S. imperialist aggression forces' permanent presence in south Korea.
					
					 The "treaty" made it possible for the U.S. to emerge a de facto ruler of south Korea and intensify its domination not only over the military field but over political, economic, cultural, diplomatic and all other fabrics of its society.
					
					 Much upset to see its military presence and the system of colonial rule over south Korea shaking in face of the dynamic advance of the June 15 era of reunification, the U.S. is seeking a way out in tightening the politico-military alliance with south Korea.
					
					 The south Korean conservative authorities' moves to provoke a war of aggression against the DPRK in collusion with the U.S. created such a tense situation on the Korean Peninsula that a war may break out any moment. Their moves also seriously obstructed the development of the inter-Korean relations and threw a stumbling block in the way of the movement for independent reunification. 
					
					 There is no justification whatsoever for such unequal "treaty" for aggression as the above-said "treaty" to exist at present, the article notes, stressing that it should have been abrogated long ago in the light of international law and the desire of the Korean nation.

articles.title: US Forces' Violation of Rights to Labor Blasted
articles.content:
US Forces' Violation of Rights to Labor Blasted
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions called a press conference outside the U.S. embassy in Seoul on Sept. 28 to accuse the U.S. forces of highhanded practices. 
					 The organization referred to the fact that on the same day taxi drivers staged a rally outside the U.S. military base in Tongduchon of Kyonggi Province to protest against the management side's refusal to have collective bargaining and crackdown upon the trade union. 
					
					 In this regard, the U.S. forces notified of non-permission to taxi business for the reason that the rally was called in front of the military base and the management side discharged all its participants under this pretext, it pointed out. 
					
					 The organization charged that it is evidently an infringement upon the right to labor for the U.S. forces to meddle in the legitimate activities of the trade union and incite the suppression of it.
					
					 It urged the U.S. ambassador and the commander of the U.S. forces present in south Korea to directly come out to investigation into the truth behind the case and take measures to prevent the recurrence of such case.

articles.title: Release of Rev. Han Sang Ryol Demanded
articles.content:
Release of Rev. Han Sang Ryol Demanded
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Progress, the Association for Defending the June 15 Joint Declaration, Peace and Rev. Han Sang Ryol and the Christian Measure Committee for Reverend Han Sang Ryol's Visit to the North for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in south Korea at a press conference on Sept. 27 accused the puppet authorities of suppressing the reunification champion.
					 In a press release the organizations said that Han visited the north guided by religious faith as the Lee Myung Bak regime disallowed the joint events of the nation to mark the 10th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration and groundlessly linked the warship case to the north, pushing the inter-Korean relations to the brink of war.
					
					 Han's statements with which the prosecution took issue had nothing to do with a political objective as they were aimed at inter-Korean reconciliation and cooperation, they held. 
					
					 They branded the regime's suppression of Han's activities for peace and reunification on the charge of violation of the "National Security Law" as an act of standing in the way of reunification.
					
					 They urged the authorities to immediately stop the suppression of Han, release him without delay and abolish the NSL, a fascist law.

articles.title: Puppet Clique's Acts of Treachery Blasted
articles.content:
Puppet Clique's Acts of Treachery Blasted
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea on Sept. 28 at the 105th rally for peace and disarmament held in front of the building of the puppet Ministry of National Defence condemned the puppet group for its sycophancy and submission.
					 A resolution read out there accused the south Korean authorities of seeking to adopt the "strategic alliance 2015" at the forthcoming "U.S.-south Korea annual security consultative meeting." This is a detailed follow-measure to be taken in the wake of the postponement of the transfer of the wartime operation control by the U.S. armed forces in south Korea, it said.
					
					 The resolution recalled that the "strategic alliance 2015" calls for increasing the capability for a preemptive attack on the DPRK and the role of the U.S. forces, etc.
					
					 Strongly denouncing the Lee Myung Bak regime for committing such acts of treachery as infringing upon the interests of the nation and inciting a war, the resolution urged the south Korean people to wage a dynamic struggle for the retraction of such humiliating "strategic alliance 2015" aimed to block the peaceful reunification of the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Congratulate Kim Jong Il's Reelection
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Congratulate Kim Jong Il's Reelection
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Switzerland Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on Sept. 28 congratulating General Secretary Kim Jong Il on his reelection as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The statement noted that his reelection as general secretary of the WPK was an expression of absolute trust and respect of all the party members, servicepersons and people of the DPRK for him.
					
					 This historic event means the highest praise of the immortal feats Kim Jong Il has performed by building Korean-style socialism based on the Juche idea and wisely leading the struggle of the Korean people to reunify the country, it noted, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il has built the DPRK into a political and military power and defended the sovereignty of the country true to the intention of President Kim Il Sung and turned socialist Korea into an invincible bulwark of world socialism by pursuing the Songun politics.
					
					 On the same day, Hasanul Huq Inu, chairman of the Central Executive Committee of the Bangladesh National Socialist Party, in a statement extended the warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Il on his reelection as general secretary of the WPK.

articles.title: Anniversary of WPK Greeted
articles.content:
Anniversary of WPK Greeted
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- Rashed Khan Menon, chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers’ Party of Bangladesh, issued a statement on Sept. 26 on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The statement noted that he extended warm congratulations to General Secretary Kim Jong Il and the ever-victorious WPK on the occasion of the anniversary of the WPK. 
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The 65 year-long history of the WPK is a glorious course in which it has turned the DPRK into a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence, and led Korean-style socialism and the human cause of independence to shining victory despite all sorts of trials. 
					
					 The WPK having Kim Jong Il as its general secretary has demonstrated its dignity as the eternal party of President Kim Il Sung and led the Korean revolution to steady victory and the Korean people have set a world-wide example in the struggle to protect the sovereignty of the country. 
					
					 We voice full support and solidarity with the WPK and the Korean people in their just cause, expressing firm belief that the WPK and the army and the people in the DPRK would achieve greater success in their efforts to reunify the country and build a thriving nation under the outstanding leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: WPK's Feats Praised in Mexico
articles.content:
WPK's Feats Praised in Mexico
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea released the 65th issue of its bulletin on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The bulletin carried a photo of the Party Founding Memorial Tower and an article titled "The Party serving the people".
					
					 The bulletin in an article said that the WPK whose guiding idea is the Juche idea that the popular masses are masters of the revolution and construction and they are also the motive force of the revolution and construction has worked out all the line and policies in reflection of the wishes and aspirations of the people.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung, the founder of the WPK, always mixing with people, paid heed to their voices and set forth line and policies reflecting their wishes and aspirations.
					
					  General Secretary Kim Jong Il unrolled a plan to build a thriving socialist nation where the nation's power is strong, everything is prospering and the people lead a happy life with no more to desire in the world and has led the struggle for implementing them.
					
					 The bulletin gave a detailed account of the facts that true to the intention of the President, Kim Jong Il made sure that the WPK places the interests of the people above anything else and takes care of their living in a responsible manner.

articles.title: US and S. Korean DPRK-targeted War Moves Assailed
articles.content:
US and S. Korean DPRK-targeted War Moves Assailed
 Pyongyang, October 2 (KCNA) -- The Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy issued a statement on Sept. 27 denouncing the United States and the south Korean puppet forces for their war moves against the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean puppet authorities' ceaseless war exercises targeted against the DPRK are deliberate military provocations to escalate confrontation.
					
					 They have staged ceaseless war exercises against the DPRK in the East and West seas of Korea and all parts of south Korea by mobilizing huge aggression forces since the outbreak of the "Cheonan" case. 
					
					 These reckless war exercises only further increase the danger of armed conflicts. 
					
					 We support the DPRK's stand that it wants dialogue but will never pardon those who provoke it and deal merciless blows at them and strongly urge the U.S. and south Korean puppet authorities to immediately stop such reckless war exercises against the DPRK, the statement stressed.

articles.title: Seran emitidas monedas conmemorativas del 10 de octubre
articles.content:
Seran emitidas monedas conmemorativas del 10 de octubre
Pyongyang, 2 de octubre (ATCC) -- Segun el decreto fechado 1 del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, seran emitidas las monedas conmemorativas del 65o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					Las monedas de oro y plata son denominadas como "El 65o aniversario de la Fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea".
					
					En el centro de la parte frontal de ellas esta en relieve el emblema del partido y en el trasfondo de este se ven el monte Paektu, el sagrado de la revolucion, la bandera de la "Union para Derrotar al Imperialismo" y los rayos del sol.
					
					En la parte inferior aparecen las palabras "El 65o aniversario de la Fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea", "1945" y "2010".
					
					Las partes circunferenciales a la izquierda y a la derecha son adornadas con 65 hojas de laureles.
					
					En el centro de la cara trasera aparece incrustado en relieve el escudo de la RPDC y estan indicados en ambos lados la pureza y el peso de los metales.
					
					Tambien en la parte arriba se ve la frase "Banco Central de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea" y en la parte inferior, el ano de emision.
					
					La moneda de oro puro tiene 35mm de diametro y 2 mm de grueso.
					
					Estos indices de la moneda de plata pura son 40mm y 3mm, respectivamente.

articles.title: Continuan actos para felicitar reeleccion de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Continuan actos para felicitar reeleccion de Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, 2 de octubre (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 2 en la comuna de Chongsan del municipio de Kangso de la ciudad de Nampho y en la explanada frente al Arco de Triunfo de esta capital, respectivamente, los actos de los trabajadores agricolas y de las funcionarias y miembros de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea, para festejar la reeleccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					  Estuvieron presentes el secretario del Comite Central del PTC, Choe Ryong Hae y otros funcionarios.
					
					  En las ocasiones hubo informes y discursos.
					
					  Los oradores senalaron que la ratificacion del Dirigente en el puesto cimero del partido preparo la garantia decisiva para defender con firmeza y llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche siguiendo la direccion del PTC. 
					
					  Varios decenios en que el Dirigente condujo el partido y la revolucion fueron los dias sagrados en que el fortalecio con su destacada idea y la magna practica revolucionaria el PTC como el partido del Presidente, invencible partido revolucionario de tipo jucheano, y realizo las imborrables proezas a ser transmitidas eternamente ante la patria, el pueblo, la epoca y la historia, afirmaron.
					
					  Subrayaron la necesidad de poner de pleno manifiesto el espiritu de defensa a ultranza al lider y apoyar con fidelidad la causa del Songun del PTC guardando la conviccion de que la prosperidad de la Corea del Juche y la felicidad del pueblo se aseguran por el gran Dirigente insigne del Songun.
					
					  El mismo dia, se realizaron actos similares tambien en las provincias de Kangwon y de Hamgyong del Norte.
					
					  En los actos los oradores ratificaron que la reeleccion del Dirigente como Secretario General del PTC es la manifestacion de absoluto apoyo e infinita veneracion del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea hacia el quien con su incansable practica revolucionaria realizo inmortales hazanas ante la patria, la nacion, la epoca y la historia.

articles.title: DDILF envia aviso a la parte Sur
articles.content:
DDILF envia aviso a la parte Sur
Pyongyang, 2 de octubre (ATCC) -- La Direccion de Desarrollo Integral de Lugares Famosos envio el dia 2 una carta de aviso al Ministerio de Reunificacion del Sur de Corea proponiendo hacer las conversaciones de expertos entre las autoridades del Norte y el Sur.
					  La nota le propone hacer el dia 15 en Kaesong las conversaciones de expertos entre las autoridades del Norte y el Sur de Corea sobre los problemas de los bienes inmuebles de la parte Sur en la zona del monte Kumgang y de la reanudacion del turismo segun el acuerdo en el contacto de expertos entre el Norte y el Sur efectuado el dia primero y le anuncia que la parte Norte enviara el director de la DDILF y otros 2 funcionarios correspondientes.

articles.title: RPDC fomentara la amistad con los miembros de ONU, dice Pak Kil Yon
articles.content:
RPDC fomentara la amistad con los miembros de ONU, dice Pak Kil Yon
Pyongyang, 2 de octubre (ATCC) -- El gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea desarrollara mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con todos los paises miembros de la ONU y cumplira con toda su responsabilidad en defender la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del mundo, dijo el vicecanciller Pak Kil Yon, quien preside la delegacion coreana, en su discurso pronunciado el 29 de septiembre en la reunion plenaria del 65o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU.
					Los 65 anos pasados de la ONU devienen una historia de constantes desafios al objetivo y los principios de la Carta de la ONU, asevero y continuo:
					
					Debido al despotismo y las arbitrariedades de las potencias, se ven violados y destruidos la ley y el orden internacionales y se malemplean el cartel de "defensa de derechos humanos" y la Asamblea General de la ONU.
					
					La RPDC es una de las victimas de ello.
					
					Es preciso fortalecer el papel de la ONU y elevar decisivamente la autoridad de la Asamblea General mediante la reforma mas activa y correcta de la ONU. 
					
					El 30o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU, realizado en 1975, aprobo la resolucion de desmantelar la "comandancia de las fuerzas de la ONU" en el Sur de Corea, retirar a los uniformados foraneos y sustituir el Acuerdo de Armisticio por el convenio de paz, como una medida para aliviar la tension y preservar la paz duradera de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Aunque pasaron 35 anos desde entonces, la Peninsula Coreana no se halla en la guerra ni en la paz, es decir, persiste el estado de armisticio.
					
					Dado que la resolucion de la Asamblea General de la ONU no se ha ejecutado, se ven amenazados y violados permanentemente los esfuerzos de Corea por la soberania y el desarrollo pacifico y se crea periodicamente en la Peninsula Coreana la situacion explosiva a punto de estallar la guerra.
					
					La RPDC propuso a los paises responsables del Acuerdo de Armisticio iniciar pronto las conversaciones para sustituirlo por el convenio de paz en este ano del 60o aniversario del estallido de la guerra coreana.
					
					De lograrse eso, la Asamblea General de la ONU podra ver por fin el inicio de la ejecucion de esa resolucion historica aprobada hace 35 anos.
					
					Es invariable la posicion de la RPDC contra la guerra nuclear, la carrera armamentista nuclear y la proliferacion nuclear. 
					
					La RPDC, siendo un pais responsable con armas nucleares, tiene la voluntad de unirse a los esfuerzos internacionales por la no proliferacion nuclear y la administracion segura de sustancias nucleares en la posicion igual a otros paises portadores de armas nucleares. 
					
					Por ultimo, Pak rechazo totalmente las palabras provocativas del "delegado" surcoreano quien volvio a cuestionar el incidente de hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana "Cheonan" interpretando mal hasta la declaracion del presidente del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, fechada 9 de julio de 2010, y enfatizo que como lo establecido en este documento, las autoridades surcoreanas deben proceder inmediatamente al dialogo Norte-Sur para resolver los problemas pendientes.

articles.title: Japon no debe eludir por mas tiempo liquidacion del pasado criminal
articles.content:
Japon no debe eludir por mas tiempo liquidacion del pasado criminal
Pyongyang, 2 de octubre (ATCC) -- Japon debe reflexionar profundamente de sus crimenes cometidos en el pasado contra el pueblo coreano y los demas asiaticos y tomar cuanto antes la decision de liquidarlos completamente dandose cuenta de que esto conviene tambien a si mismo.
					  Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual del dia 2 y continua:
					
					Si el mandatario japones hubiera tenido el correcto punto de vista de la historia de los crimenes de su pais, debio aclarar concretamente este problema y expresar claramente la posicion de disculparse e indemnizar.
					
					 El problema de como recompensar los crimenes del pasado sera una pauta importante para verificar la sinceridad de la disculpa.
					
					  Los reaccionarios japoneses maniobran taimadamente para dejar en el olvido de la historia los verdaderos aspectos de sus crimenes del pasado, en vez de aclararlos y dar la nueva partida hacia la paz y el progreso.
					
					  Tal actitud mala de Japon no es la simple evasiva de la recompensacion, sino parte de su ilusion de realizar su antiguo sueno de la "esfera de coprosperidad de la gran Asia Oriental".
					
					  En el mismo contexto, da acicate a los preparativos para retomar el camino de agresion tergiversando la historia.
					
					  La liquidacion del pasado criminal es la tarea y responsabilidad historicas que Japon debe cumplir sin falta tarde o temprano.
					
					 Si Japon sigue actuando como ahora, sera repudiado y asilado mas en la sociedad internacional.
